chart.title: Events Over Time By Method
chart.searchTemplate: | `tstats` count from datamodel=Web where * $bunit$ $category$ by _time,Web.http_method span=10m | timechart minspan=10m useother=`useother` count by Web.http_method | `drop_dm_object_name("Web")`

chart.title: Events Over Time By Status
chart.searchTemplate: | `tstats` count from datamodel=Web where * $bunit$ $category$ by _time,Web.status span=10m | timechart minspan=10m useother=`useother` count by Web.status | `drop_dm_object_name("Web")`

table.title: Top Sources
table.searchTemplate: | `tstats` dc(Web.dest),count from datamodel=Web where earliest="$earliest$" latest="$latest$" $bunit$ $category$ by Web.src | eval group="current" | `tstats` append=true dc(Web.dest),count from datamodel=Web where $bunit$ $category$ [| `make_previous_time_range("$earliest$","$latest$")`] by Web.src | fillnull value="historical" group | stats dc(Web.dest) as dc_dest,count by Web.src,group | `drop_dm_object_name("Web")` | eval dc_dest=if(group="historical",0,dc_dest) | eval current_count=if(group="current",count,0) | eval historical_count=if(group="historical",count,0) | stats max(dc_dest) as dc(dest),sum(current_count) as current_count,sum(historical_count) as historical_count by src| `get_delta` | rename delta as delta_count | eval count=current_count | eval abs(delta_count)=abs(delta_count) | sort 100 -abs(delta_count)

table.title: Top Destinations
table.searchTemplate: | `tstats` dc(Web.src),count from datamodel=Web where earliest="$earliest$" latest="$latest$" $bunit$ $category$ by Web.dest | eval group="current" | `tstats` append=true dc(Web.src),count from datamodel=Web where $bunit$ $category$ [| `make_previous_time_range("$earliest$","$latest$")`] by Web.dest | fillnull value="historical" group | stats dc(Web.src) as dc_src,count by Web.dest,group | `drop_dm_object_name("Web")` | eval dc_src=if(group="historical",0,dc_src) | eval current_count=if(group="current",count,0) | eval historical_count=if(group="historical",count,0) | stats max(dc_src) as dc(src),sum(current_count) as current_count,sum(historical_count) as historical_count by dest| `get_delta` | rename delta as delta_count | eval count=current_count | eval abs(delta_count)=abs(delta_count) | sort 100 -abs(delta_count)
